identity.description:
Generates a directed compatibility graph of tools in ToolUniverse.

Builds a comprehensive graph of tool compatibility relationships in ToolUniverse. Analyzes all available tools and creates a directed graph showing which tools can be composed together.

output_path.description: Path to save the generated graph files (JSON and pickle formats)

analysis_depth.description: Level of compatibility analysis to perform

min_compatibility_score.description: Minimum compatibility score to create an edge in the graph

exclude_categories.description: Tool categories to exclude from analysis (e.g., ['tool_finder', 'special_tools'])

max_tools_per_category.description: Maximum number of tools to analyze per category (for performance)

force_rebuild.description: Whether to force rebuild even if cached graph exists

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(
  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)

domain.model:

  (2): Normalize()

analysis_depth.description: Level of compatibility analysis to perform

min_compatibility_score.description: Minimum compatibility score to create an edge in the graph

exclude_categories.description: Tool categories to exclude from analysis (e.g., ['tool_finder', 'special_tools'])

max_tools_per_category.description: Maximum number of tools to analyze per category (for performance)

force_rebuild.description: Whether to force rebuild even if cached graph exists
